Hosea or Osee__05.1: Hear ye this, <u>O priests</u>, and hearken, O ye house of Israel, and give ear, O house of the king: for there is a judgment against you, because you have been a snare to them whom you should have watched over, and a net spread upon Thabor.
Hosea or Osee__05.2: And you have turned aside victims into the depth: and I am, the teacher of them all.
Hosea or Osee__05.3: I know Ephraim, and Israel is not hid from me: for now Ephraim hath committed fornication, Israel is defiled.
Hosea or Osee__05.4: They will not set their thoughts to return to their God: for the spirit of fornication is in the midst of them, and they have not known the Lord.
Hosea or Osee__05.5: And the pride of Israel shall answer in his face: and Israel and Ephraim shall fall in their iniquity, Juda also shall fall with them.
Hosea or Osee__05.6: With their flocks, and with their herds, they shall go to seek the Lord, and shall not find him: he is withdrawn from them.
Hosea or Osee__05.7: They have transgressed against the Lord, for they have begotten <u>children that are strangers</u>: now shall a month devour them with their portions.
Hosea or Osee__05.8: Blow ye the cornet in Gabaa, the trumpet in Rama: howl ye in Bethaven, behind thy back, O Benjamin.
Hosea or Osee__05.9: Ephraim shall be in desolation in the day of rebuke: among the tribes of Israel I have shewn that which shall surely be.
Hosea or Osee__05.10: The princes of Juda are become <u>as they that take up the bound</u>: I will pour out my wrath upon them like water.
Hosea or Osee__05.11: Ephraim is under oppression, and broken in judgment: because he began to go after filthiness.
Hosea or Osee__05.12: And I will be like a moth to Ephraim: and like rottenness to the house of Juda.
Hosea or Osee__05.13: And Ephraim saw his sickness, and Juda his band: and Ephraim went to the Assyrian, and sent to the avenging king: and he shall not be able to heal you, neither shall he be able to take off the band from you.
Hosea or Osee__05.14: For I will be like a lioness to Ephraim, and like a lion's whelp to the house of Juda: I, I will catch, and go: I will take away, and there is none that can rescue.
Hosea or Osee__05.15: I will go and return to my place: until you are consumed, and seek my face.
